column2: "This is the other side of Valentine's Day's! That's right, it's White Day!"
"I'll be just as busy for White Day as I was for Valentine's Day! Working, working!"
"I'm happy for my success, but as a result, I don't have enough decorative materials!"
"...um, if you wouldn't mind, could you get me some? Oh, I don't know what I'm thinking!"
"But please, please! Get me what I ask!"
